info.name: Appointment360 API
info.description: Postman collection for the Appointment360 FastAPI backend. Sample parameters align with docs/apis.md.

item.name: System
item.description: Operational endpoints exposed alongside the versioned API router.

request.description: Return API metadata such as project name, version, and documentation URL.
Health probe served under the versioned API prefix.
Unversioned health check defined in app/main.py.

item.name: Contacts
item.description: Contact list, detail, creation, and attribute lookup endpoints.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated set of contacts using every supported filter parameter.

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/contacts/?limit=25&offset=0&cursor=bz0w&page=1&page_size=25&distinct=true&ordering=last_name&search=cyber&first_name=Patrick&last_name=McGarry&title=Chief Technology Officer&exclude_titles=Chief Technology Officer&seniority=C suite&exclude_seniorities=C suite&department=C-Suite,Engineering & Technical&departments=C-Suite,Engineering & Technical&exclude_departments=C-Suite,Engineering & Technical&email=pat.mcgarry@banduracyber.com&email_status=Verified&company={{sampleCompany}}&name={{sampleCompany}}&company_name_for_emails={{sampleCompany}}&company_location=McLean Virginia United States,Portsmouth New Hampshire United States&company_text_search=McLean Virginia United States,Portsmouth New Hampshire United States&exclude_company_locations=McLean Virginia United States,Portsmouth New Hampshire United States&contact_location=Fulton Maryland United States&text_search=Fulton Maryland United States&exclude_contact_locations=Fulton Maryland United States&employees_count=27&employees=27&employees_min=20&employees_max=35&annual_revenue=7708000&annual_revenue_min=7000000&annual_revenue_max=9000000&total_funding=35875000&total_funding_min=20000000&total_funding_max=40000000&latest_funding_amount_min=3500000&latest_funding_amount_max=40000000&technologies=Salesforce,Sendgrid&exclude_technologies=Salesforce,Sendgrid&keywords=cyber security&exclude_keywords=cyber security&industries=information technology & services&exclude_industries=information technology & services&exclude_company_ids={{sampleCompanyUuid}}&mobile_phone=+1 937-555-0132&work_direct_phone=+1 937-555-0200&home_phone=+1 937-555-0201&other_phone=+1 937-555-0202&corporate_phone=+1 703-555-0199&company_phone=+1 703-555-0199&city={{sampleCity}}&state={{sampleState}}&country={{sampleCountry}}&company_city=McLean&company_state=Virginia&company_country=United States&company_address=McLean Virginia United States&person_linkedin_url=linkedin.com/in/patrickmcgarry&company_linkedin_url=linkedin.com/company/bandura&website=banduracyber.com&facebook_url=facebook.com/banduracyber&twitter_url=twitter.com/banduracyber&stage=Customer&created_at_after=2024-01-01T00:00:00&created_at_before=2024-12-31T23:59:59&updated_at_after=2024-06-01T00:00:00&updated_at_before=2024-10-01T00:00:00

request.description: Fetch details for a single contact by primary key.
Create a new contact record using the ContactCreate schema. All body fields are optional.

body.raw:
{
  "uuid": "f4b8c3f5-1111-4f9b-aaaa-123456789abc",
  "first_name": "Patrick",
  "last_name": "McGarry",
  "company_id": "398cce44-233d-5f7c-aea1-e4a6a79df10c",
  "email": "pat.mcgarry@banduracyber.com",
  "title": "Chief Technology Officer",
  "departments": [
    "C-Suite",
    "Engineering & Technical"
  ],
  "mobile_phone": "+1 937-555-0132",
  "email_status": "Verified",
  "text_search": "Fulton Maryland United States",
  "seniority": "C suite"
}

item.name: Imports
item.description: Endpoints supporting the contacts CSV import workflow.

request.description: Provides instructions for uploading a contacts CSV file.
Start a background contacts import using the sample CSV file from the repository.

formdata.description: Upload the sample CSV located under data/data/apollo_sample_5000_cleaned.csv.

request.description: Fetch the status of a queued import job without embedded errors.

query.description: Toggle inclusion of row-level error details.

request.description: Fetch the status of a queued import job with embedded error payloads.

query.description: Embed recorded errors in the response.

request.description: Retrieve recorded row-level import errors for the specified job.

variable.description: Sample value for the X-Contacts-Write-Key header.
